Title: Enthusiastically put away savings, to support the "Four Modernizations" in agriculture
Publisher: Shaanxi Provincial Branch of the People’s Bank of China (中国人民银行陕西省分行)
Notes: An undated poster from the Great Leap Forward, published by the Shaanxi Provincial Branch of the People’s Bank of China (中国人民银行陕西省分行), printed on tired, old paper. Using papercut-like images, it urges the people to save money to support the "Four Modernizations" stressed during the period: electrification; irrigation and water management; use of fertilizer; and mechanization.
